summary:
This mod adds two sets of light armor which are craftable at
any forge under the leather category and each piece is fully temperable.
Both sets are catered towards Ranger/thief/assassin type classes. 
In addition, each set is upgradable to chainmail and mythral versions 
of its own. 

PS: If anyone would be so kind as to post their own screen
descriptionHtml:
Mod title: Nordic Ranger and Assassin pack

Date: 15/6/2013

Mod author: BryanWee20

Introduction:
This is my first mod for skyrim, its just a simple retext and mix & match 
of default ingame meshes that makes up both armor sets in this mod.

Summary: 
This mod adds two sets of light armor which are craftable at
any forge under the leather category and each piece is fully temperable.
Both sets are catered towards Ranger/thief/assassin type classes. 
In addition, each set is upgradable to chainmail and mythral versions 
of its own. 

Installation:
Copy the entire contents into the data folder in main skyrim directory. 
Activate the esp 
Start the game
author: Bryanwee20
